SEARCH
Package map.levels

Class BattlePhase

java.lang.Object
map.levels.BattlePhase
All Implemented Interfaces:
Level
public class BattlePhase extends Object implements Level
The BattlePhase class represents a specific level phase in the game where the player engages in combat with enemies.

  • Constructor Details

    • BattlePhase

      public BattlePhase(String lvlData, String enemies, Tile[] tiles)
      Constructs a new BattlePhase instance with the specified level data, enemy data, and tiles.
      Parameters:
      lvlData - The file path to the level data used in this battle phase.
      enemies - The file path to the enemy data for this battle phase.
      tiles - An array of Tile objects representing the tiles in the game's environment.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start(Player player)
      Initializes the battle phase by loading level data, setting the player's start position, and preparing the level for interaction.
      Specified by:
      start in interface Level
      Parameters:
      player - The player object to be positioned and associated with this battle phase.

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the current state of the battle phase. This method focuses on handling camera adjustments, enemy actions, and player attack dynamics.
      Specified by:
      update in interface Level

    • complete

      public void complete()
      Marks the current battle phase as complete if all enemies have been defeated. Player is rewarded with 100 experience points (XP) for successfully completing the phase.
      Specified by:
      complete in interface Level
